name: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 on Chromebook
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 on Chromebook
description:
FNAF 2 But on chromebook! 

I own none of this game I only did a chromebook port Scott Cawthon/Animdude made the real game and you should buy it on Steam to support him!

Its on Xbox, Playstation, PC, Nintendo Switch, etc..

https://store.steampowered.com/app/332800/Five_Nights_at_Freddys_2/?curator_clan...

https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/five-nights-at-freddys-2/9nbr2zsd99fx

https://store.playstation.com/product/UP5549-CUSA17980_00-FNAF200000000000

https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/five-nights-at-freddys-2-switch/

Instructions!

Front arrow key for front hall lights and while in camera.  Use mouse to move.  Survive till 6AM.
